Arpit,

There is not a built-in way to do what you want.  You can:

1) Crea=
te a Suite class that references all of the test classes you want to run.
2=
) Use something like http://johanneslink.net/projects/cpsuite.jsp
3) Use an=
t

There's a feature request for including this in core junit:

https://git=
hub.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/37

Good luck,

   David Saff
